code_snippet:
super().__init__(**options)

    def shorten_text(self, text: str, /) -> str:
        """:class:`str`: Shortens text to fit into the :attr:`width`.

        .. versionchanged:: 2.0

            ``text`` parameter is now positional-only.
        """
        if len(text) > self.width:
            return text[: self.width - 3].rstrip() + '...'
        return text
